name: Order: Light Escort
desc: Assigns the ship a light escort order when it joins the battle.
short: Assigns the ship a light escort order when it joins the battle.

name: Order: Medium Escort
desc: Assigns the ship a medium escort order when it joins the battle.
short: Assigns the ship a medium escort order when it joins the battle.

name: Order: Heavy Escort
desc: Assigns the ship a heavy escort order when it joins the battle.
short: Assigns the ship a heavy escort order when it joins the battle.

name: Order: Search and Destroy
desc: Gives the ship a search-and-destroy order when it joins the battle.
short: Gives the ship a search-and-destroy order when it joins the battle.

name: Personality Override: Reckless
desc: Sets the ship's personality to reckless. (Does not override officer personality by default.)
short: Sets the ship's personality to reckless.

name: Personality Override: Aggressive
desc: Sets the ship's personality to aggressive. (Does not override officer personality by default.)
short: Sets the ship's personality to aggressive.

name: Personality Override: Steady
desc: Sets the ship's personality to steady.
short: Sets the ship's personality to steady. (Does not override officer personality by default.)

name: Personality Override: Cautious
desc: Sets the ship's personality to cautious. (Does not override officer personality by default.)
short: Sets the ship's personality to cautious.

name: Personality Override: Timid
desc: Sets the ship's personality to timid.
short: Sets the ship's personality to timid. (Does not override officer personality by default.)

name: Order: Retreat when Missiles Expended
desc: Orders the ship to retreat when it is out of missiles. Does not trigger if the ship has no missiles, or if it has reloading missiles.
short: Orders the ship to retreat when it is out of missiles.
